trans-unit.source: A special kind of property that can be defined or attached to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
There are three kinds of dependency properties: instance properties, meta properties, and attached properties.
This class cannot be inherited.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Dependency properties support three use cases.

First, if an instance property of an activity is implemented by using a dependency property, that property can be assigned an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> instead of an actual value.

Second, activity properties that are metadata (that is, the value cannot change at run time) should be implemented by using dependency properties, specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> option.
Third, dependency properties support attached properties, which are properties that are applied to dependency objects dynamically.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> that represents user-defined data for this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

Gets the registered <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> based on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The required value of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.

The registered <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> based on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType*>.
Creates an <xref:System.Collections.IList> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that belong to a specific <xref:System.Type>.
The <xref:System.Type>.
<xref:System.Collections.IList> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that belong to a specific <xref:System.Type>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.

The hash code computed here is the `bitwise AND` of the hash codes generated by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> attributes of this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
A hash code for this instance.

Gets the property that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is associated to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> by registration.

The value returned indicates whether this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> has been registered by using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if attached to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the property that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is an event <xref:System.Delegate>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is an event <xref:System.Delegate>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the Name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The Name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the value stored in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Type> of the value stored in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> class that has the properties parameterized according to the input parameters.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
<xref:System.Type> of the value that the property can contain.
Owner <xref:System.Type> of the dependency property.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> class that has the properties parameterized according to the input parameters.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> class that has the properties parameterized according to the input parameters.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
<xref:System.Type> of the value the property can contain.
Owner <xref:System.Type> of the dependency property.
Additional property options.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> class that has the properties parameterized according to the input parameters.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> class that has the properties parameterized according to the input parameters.
This instance is intended to declare properties that are used on objects other than the objects of owning type.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

Owner <xref:System.Type> of the dependency property.

The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
<xref:System.Type> of the value the property can contain.
Owner <xref:System.Type> of the dependency property.
Additional property options.
<xref:System.Type> of object that implements validation logic for the attached property.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> class that has the properties parameterized according to the input parameters.
Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the target object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the data.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the data.
Overrides the <xref:System.Object> method to return the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> property value.
This represents the name of the property or event that is being mirrored by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name*> property value.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> implementing validation logic specific to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Type> implementing validation logic specific to this instance.
